title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields
description: When viewing the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, it is observed that text fields are being used. This issue is present in the Integration build 09/17 and it looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When viewing the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, text fields are being used.
EB: When viewing the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, text fields should not be used.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Select a Project.
2. Right-click on the project and select Properties.
3. Navigate to the Info page.
4. Observe the readonly fields for values such as Path, Type, etc.
